mapper.select: SELECT cn.id 'id', cn.user_id 'userId', u.user_name 'username', cn.name 'name', cn.character_class 'characterClass', cn.created 'createdOn', cn.last_modified 'lastModified' FROM character_name cn, user u WHERE cn.id = #{id} AND u.id = cn.user_id

SELECT cn.id 'id', cn.user_id 'userId', cn.name 'name', cn.character_class 'characterClass', cn.created 'createdOn', cn.last_modified 'lastModified', cs.level 'level' FROM character_name cn, character_stats cs WHERE cn.user_id = #{userId} AND cn.id = cs.id ORDER BY cn.name

SELECT cn.id 'id', cn.user_id 'userId', cn.name 'name', cn.character_class 'characterClass', cn.created 'createdOn', cn.last_modified 'lastModified', cs.level 'level' FROM character_name cn, character_stats cs WHERE cn.user_id = #{userId} AND cn.id = cs.id AND cn.character_class = #{characterClass} ORDER BY cn.name
